overview: Thea Pratt explores the exhilarating moment of a poetic dive. The movement of the puppet diver is influenced by Norman McLaren, Leni Riefenstahl and Busby Berkeley. Dancing light, frothing oceans, rolling rivers and calm lakes describe in photographic images the diverâ€™s own stream of consciousness. This film was made as part of the second edition of the NFB's Hothouse apprenticeship.
title: Eaude
